description: What do you get when you take a FemDom, her femsub, Daddy's credit card, and the discovery of the newest high-tech fucking machine on the Planet? ShockSpot Sex! After his full demonstration of how to control the machine from a remote wireless laptop, Bluetooth voice control and a smart phone, Mistress Irony puts Ava through the paces, combining great fucking machine action with a full scene of BDSM sex, bringing Ava to multiple screaming orgasms!
title: My Favorite New Toy
